articles.description: There's a lot of evidence that more exercise helps reduce cancer risk – but why are the two connected? According to a new mouse study, it may be down to a metabolic shift that appears to give muscle cells more fuel to burn, while 'starving' cancer cells of en…
articles.content:
There's a lot of evidence that more exercise helps reduce cancer risk but why are the two connected?
